{{Infobox company | name = DW Practice, LLC | logo =[[Image:DW Practice Company Logo.jpg|200px|DW Practice Logo]] | type = Private Company | foundation = 1998 | location_city = [[Atlanta, Georgia]] | location_country = [[United States]] | area_served = Worldwide | industry = IT Services | homepage = [http://www.dwpractice.com/ dwpractice.com] | intl = yes }}
'''DW Practice, LLC''' is an [[Atlanta]] based provider of [[Information Technology]] services. The company offers services related to Enterprise [[Data Management]], Application Development, Product Engineering, QA and Testing and [[Managed Services]].<ref>http://www.dwpractice.com</ref> DW Practice has offices and solution delivery centers across the [[United States|US]] and [[India]].<ref>http://www.openpr.com/news/251224/DW-Practice-Expands-its-India-Presence-with-New-Office-in-Bangalore.html?SID=619b6a0fc9487b7531efe191abb07590</ref> [[Data warehouse|Data Warehousing]] and [[Business Intelligence]], Application Development, [[Big Data]], [[Cloud Computing]] and Mobile Technologies are the key focus areas for DW Practice.<ref>http://www.prlog.org/12070491-dw-practice-expands-its-india-presence-with-new-office-in-bangalore.html</ref> The company has strategic partnerships with [[IBM]], [[Microsoft]]<ref>http://pinpoint.microsoft.com/en-US/partners/DW-Practice-LLC-4297899400</ref>, and [[Oracle Corporation|Oracle]].<ref>https://solutions.oracle.com/scwar/sc/Partner/SCPP-DWPRACTICE.html</ref>
==Services== DW Practice's core service offerings include: * Enterprise [[Data Management]] * Enterprise Application Management * QA and Testing * Product Engineering * [[Managed Services]]
==Technology Solutions== * [[Data warehouse|Data Warehousing]] and [[Business Intelligence]] * [[Big Data]] * [[Cloud Computing]] * Mobility * [[Microsoft]] Solutions * [[IBM]] Solutions * [[Oracle]] Solutions
==Global Locations==
* '''USA''' – [[Atlanta, Georgia|Atlanta]] (GA), [[Glendale, California|Glendale]] (CA) * '''India''' – [[Hyderabad, India|Hyderabad]], [[Bangalore]]
==External links== *[http://www.dwpractice.com/ DW Practice Official Website] *[http://www.linkedin.com/company/dw-practice/ DW Practice Official LinkedIn Account] *[http://www.facebook.com/dwpractice DW Practice Official Facebook Page] *[http://www.twitter.com/dwpracticellc DW Practice Official Twitter Account]
